name: You're Dead After School
description:
You're dead after school!

The bullies are waiting for you at the flagpole. But you and your best pal have a secret weapon: The Fizz Turbo Booster on your rad racer. Player 1 controls Left Boost with 'Z'. Player 2 controls Right Boost with '?'.

Memorize the way home, and work together to make those turns! Safety awaits!

(press SPACE to advance through title screen)
